element-citation.article-title: The importance of mealworm larvae (T enebrio molitor, L. 1758) as carriers of zearalenone when fed to insectivorous birds and other pet animals
element-citation.source: The importance of the larvae of the flour beetle ( Tenebrio molitor, L. 1758) as a carrier of zearalenone in the feeding of insectivorous birds and other pets
